content: materials our pocket full of posy blanket requires… - main color 8 skeins of purl soho s posy 1 75% superwash merino 15% cashmere and 10% nylon each skein is 159 yards/50 grams approximately 1272 total yards required we used heirloom white - contrast colors 18 skeins of posy approximately 77 yards required of cc 1 and 18 and 71 yards of cc s 2-17 colors listed below in the color key section you will also need… - us 2 3 mm 32- or 40-inch circular needles 3 gauge - unblocked 27 stitches and 50 row = 4 inches in brioche stitch - blocked 20 stitches and 58 row = 4 inches in brioche stitch size - unblocked dimensions 28 inches wide x 51 inches long - finished dimensions 38 inches wide x 52 inches long designed for purl soho by jake canton 1 https //www purlsoho com/posy 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=968 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796
